#summary Commands for compiling and installing phyloloc in Mac OSX

= Introduction =

For installing phyloloc in Mac OSX, please follow the next steps.

= Details =

  # Install qt
    # Download and install the lastest version of Qt Libraries for Mac from [http://qt.nokia.com/downloads here].
  # Install mili library
    # svn checkout http://mili.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ mili-read-only
    # The previous command downloads mili in the folder mili-read-only.
      # cd mili-read-only
      # sudo ./install.sh
  # Download and compile phyloloc
    # svn checkout http://phyloloc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ phyloloc-read-only
    # The previous command generates the folder phyloloc-read-only. 
      # cd phyloloc-read-only/src
      # qmake -spec macx-g++ phyloloc.pro
      # make
  # Run phyloloc
    # A phyloloc.app application will be generated in the source (phyloloc-read-only/src) folder. Double click on it to execute phyloloc.
